Articles.Content: I think the colorization of the lights are the greatest thing since split atoms! It enables you to turn your ship into a cheap carnival ride all the way to something out of close encounters! However, (Yeah here comes the BIG BUT) Why is it that the lenses (the bulb, or what ever you want to call it) remains white? It would look so much "cooler" if the refracting lens emitted the same color! Anyone with me here on this wave length?
Probably would be much more complicated to change the lens colour. I think it's an animation or something (I have no idea what I'm talking about)
